MICRO
 c BOOTSTRAP
m00 0000000000011100001100001001000111010111	SWITCHES+0->PC,MAR
m01 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000	next(pc)
 c LOAD R $K
m02 0000000000010100001100100010100111011110	PC+2->PC,MAR
m03 0000000000011100000100000000000011011101	MDR+0->NOP,MAR
m04 0000000000011100001100001000000110011101	MDR+0->X
m05 0000000000010100100100100000010011011110	PC-1->NOP,MAR
m06 0000000000011100000100000000000010011101	MDR+0->NOP
m07 0000000000010000001110000000000010011111	X+0->RAMF,FEEDREG (SELB=0) 
m08 0000000000010100001100100010010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m09 0000000000000000000000000000000010000000	next(pc)
 c STORE R $K
m0a 0000000000010100001100100010010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m0b 0000000000011100001100001000000110011101	MDR+0->X
m0c 0000000000010100001100100010010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m0d 0000000000011100000100000000000011011101	MDR+0->NOP,MAR
m0e 0000000000010000000110000000000010011111	X+0->NOP
m0f 0000000000001100000100000000000000011111	R+0->NOP,MWE~,SELB
m10 0000000000010100001100100010010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m11 0000000000000000000000000000000010000000	next(pc)
 c ADD R $K
m12 0000000000010100001100100010100111011110	PC+2->PC,MAR
m13 0000000000011100000100000000000011011101	MDR+0->NOP,MAR
m14 0000000000011100001100001000000110011101	MDR+0->X
m15 0000000000010100100100100000010011011110	PC-1->NOP, MAR
m16 0000000000011100000100000000000010011101	MDR+0->NOP
m17 0000000000000100001110000000000010011111	R+X->R,SELB
m18 0000000000010100001100100010010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m19 0000000000000000000000000000000010000000	next(pc)
 c SUB R $K
m1a 0000000000010100001100100010100111011110	PC+2->PC,MAR
m1b 0000000000011100000100000000000011011101	MDR+0->NOP,MAR
m1c 0000000000011100001100001000000110011101	MDR+0->X X=($K)
m1d 0000000000010100100100100000010011011110	PC-1->NOP, MAR
m1e 0000000000011100000100000000000010011101	MDR+0->NOP
m1f 0000000000000100101110000000000010011111	R-X->R,SELB
m20 0000000000010100001100100010010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m21 0000000000000000000000000000000010000000	next(pc)
 c ADD R1 R2
m22 0000000000010100001100100010100111011110	PC+2->PC,MAR
m23 0000000000011100000100000000000010011101	MDR+0->NOP
m24 0000000000001100000000000000000010011111	R2+0->QREG, SELB
m25 0000000000001000001100001000000110011111	Q+0->X
m26 0000000000010100100100100000010011011110	PC-1->NOP, MAR
m27 0000000000011100000100000000000010011101	MDR+0->NOP
m28 0000000000000100001110000000000010011111	R1+X->R1
m29 0000000000010100001100100010010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m2a 0000000000000000000000000000000010000000	next(pc)
 c SHL R
m2b 0000000000010100001100100010010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m2c 0000000000011100000100000000000010011101	MDR+0->NOP0
m2d 0000000000001100011100000000000010011111	R+0->R,RAMU,SH~
m2e 0000000000010100001100100010010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m2f 0000000000000000000000000000000010000000	next(pc)
 c DEC R
m30 0000000000010100001100100010010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m31 0000000000011100000100000000000010011101	MDR+0->NOP
m32 0000000000001100000000000000000010011111	R+0->QREG, SELB
m33 0000000000011100000100000000000010011101	MDR+0->NOP
m34 0000000000011000101100000000010010011110	Q-1->R,SELB
m35 0000000000010100001100100010010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m36 0000000000000000000000000000000010000000	next(pc)

MAPPER
m00 02 LOAD R, $K 
m01 0a STORE R, $K 
m02 12 ADD R1, $K 
m03 1a SUB R1, $K 
m04 22 ADD R1, R2 
m05 2b SHL R
m06 30 DEC R 
m07 36 halt

MAIN
m00 0O LOAD A $30
m01 0A 
m02 30 
m03 02 ADD A $31
m04 0A 
m05 31 
m06 03 SUB A $32
m07 0A 
m08 32 
m09 06 DEC A
m0a 0A 
m0b 05 SHL A 
m0c 0A 
m0d 05 SHL A
m0e 0A 
m0f 00 LOAD B $30
m10 0B 
m11 30 
m12 02 ADD B $31
m13 0B
m14 31 
m15 06 DEC B
m16 0B 
m17 05 SHL B
m18 0B 
m19 04 ADD A, B
m1a 0A 
m1b 0B 
m1c 01 STORE A $33
m1d 0A 
m1e 33 
m1f 07 HALT
m20 FF 
m21 FF 
m22 FF 
m23 FF 
m24 FF 
m25 FF 
m26 FF 
m30 03 X
m31 02 Y
m32 01 Z
m33 00 W
